alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 10:36AM EST until January 20 at 10:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow continues to reduce visibility to one quarter mile at times. DOT cameras show highly variable conditions, including poor visibility and snow covered roads. Local snow rates up to an inch per hour are still possible through midday. Lake effect snow is finally expected to weaken toward and after sunset.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
